parameters.description: Permission type that should be changed

Get all shares for a table Will be empty if table does not exist

parameters.name: permissionRead
parameters.description: Permission if receiver can read data

parameters.name: permissionCreate
parameters.description: Permission if receiver can create data

parameters.description: Permission if receiver can read data

parameters.description: Permission if receiver can create data

parameters.name: permissionManage
parameters.description: Permission if receiver can manage node

parameters.name: displayMode
parameters.description: context shares only, whether it should appear in nav bar. 0: no, 1: recipients, 2: all

put.summary: Updates the display mode of a context share

parameters.name: displayMode
parameters.description: The new value for the display mode of the nav bar icon. 0: hidden, 1: visible for recipients, 2: visible for all

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: "default" to set the default, "self" to set an override for the authenticated user

get.summary: Get all columns for a table or a underlying view Return an empty array if no columns were found

post.summary: Create a new column for a table

parameters.name: numberPrefix
parameters.description: Prefix if the column is a number field

parameters.name: numberSuffix
parameters.description: Suffix if the column is a number field

parameters.name: numberDefault
parameters.description: Default number, if column is a number

parameters.name: numberMin
parameters.description: Min value, if column is a number

parameters.name: numberMax
parameters.description: Max number, if column is a number

parameters.name: numberDecimals
parameters.description: Number of decimals, if column is a number

parameters.name: textDefault
parameters.description: Default text, if column is a text

parameters.name: textAllowedPattern
parameters.description: Allowed pattern (regex) for text columns (not yet implemented)

parameters.name: textMaxLength
parameters.description: Max length, if column is a text

parameters.name: selectionOptions
parameters.description: Options for a selection (json array{id: int, label: string})

parameters.name: selectionDefault
parameters.description: Default option IDs for a selection (json int[])

parameters.name: datetimeDefault
parameters.description: Default value, if column is datetime

parameters.name: selectedViewIds[]
parameters.description: View IDs where this column should be added to be presented

get.summary: [api v3] Get all contexts available to the requesting person
get.description: Return an empty array if no contexts were found

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: [api v2] Create a new context and return it

parameters.name: iconName
parameters.description: Material design icon name of the context

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: optional nodes to be connected to this context

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.summary: [api v2] Get information about the requests context

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

404.description: context not found or not available anymore

put.summary: [api v2] Update an existing context and return it

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: provide this parameter to set a new name

parameters.name: iconName
parameters.description: provide this parameter to set a new icon

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: provide this parameter to set a new description

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: provide this parameter to set a new list of nodes.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

delete.summary: [api v2] Delete an existing context and return it

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

put.summary: [api v2] Transfer the ownership of a context and return it

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: [api v2] Add a node to a Context

parameters.name: permissions
parameters.description: bitmask of the permissions for context recipients

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: in which order the node should appear within the context

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

delete.summary: [api v2] Remove a node from a Context

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

put.summary: [api v2] Update the order on a page of a context

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: content items with it and order values

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass
